entry.source: Those of you who can reach the main temple{F801}without your candle's flame going out will{F801}be accepted into the Ring of Gaea. The{F801}following conditions will disqualify you:{F801}認F804,5}Your candle's flame goes out{F804,0}{F801}認F804,5}You give up the quest during the trial{F804,0}{F801} {F801}
